message: Let's start with a 60/40 split.  It's important to reach an agreement quickly to maximize our shares.
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  It's still a good deal considering the inflation.
Time is money, Bob!  I'll come down a bit to 52/48.  Let's close this deal before inflation eats away more of our potential gains.
